title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.168 - Inventory
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.168 - Inventory

State Regulations

The dollar value (computed in accordance with generally
accepted accounting principles) of merchandise, materials and supplies on hand
at the close of a facility's accounting period. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.168

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
